item.title: stack pivot
item.description: xctf16_b0verflow checksec: [*] '/home/yuuoniy/MY-AEG/nightmare/modules/17-stack_pivot/xctf16_b0verflow/b0verflow' Arch: i386-32-little RELRO: Partial RELRO Stack: No canary found NX: NX disabled PIE: No PIE (0x8048000) RWX: Has RWX segments Obviously, there is a stack overflow, while the overflow buffer only is 18 byte. as a result, we could utilize stack pivot technique. we could place our shellcode on string s, then jump to here. so we need a jmp gadget. and hint() has this! (we could also use tool to find it)
